content: Investments Cryptocurrency Asked by AnonymousAsked on 29 Oct 2018Anyone investing in cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin or Ethereum in this community? What are your take on cryptocurrencies? Would love to know more about investing in these, any guides?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Yixiong ChangLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 31 Oct 2018It will be pure speculation in cryptocurrencies at this point. The 'coins' itself have zero intrinsic value. Similar to the dotcom bubble many are just mere 'shell company' like back in those days. There are some projects out there that might look promising, but it is a longshot gamble. It will take awhile before the real promising project surface.I myself is 'invested' in one project I see promising. But not much. If it goes to zero, it doesnt matter. But if it becomes a 10 or 100x bagger, it will be just like strike 4D bonus money. 0 comments0
